<tr align="center" style="background:#FFFFFF; width:100%">
<td> <a href="/wiki/EP011" title="EP011">EP011</a>
</td>
<td> <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Charmander</a>
</td>
<td> Ash's Pokédex
</td>
<td> Charmander. A flame burns on the tip of its tail from birth. It is said that a Charmander dies if its flame ever goes out.
</td></tr>
<tr align="center" style="background:#FFFFFF; width:100%">
<td> <a href="/wiki/EP025" title="EP025">EP025</a>
</td>
<td> <a href="/wiki/Rage_(move)" title="Rage (move)">Rage</a>
</td>
<td> Ash's Pokédex
</td>
<td> Charmander's special attack, <a href="/wiki/Rage_(move)" title="Rage (move)">Rage</a>. It gains more power the more it is attacked. It will continue to fight until its opponent falls.
</td></tr></table>
<table style="background: #FFAAAA" width="100%">

<tr>
<th style="border-top-left-radius: 5px; -moz-border-radius-topleft: 5px; -webkit-border-top-left-radius: 5px; -khtml-border-top-left-radius: 5px; -icab-border-top-left-radius: 5px; -o-border-top-left-radius: 5px; border-top-right-radius: 5px; -moz-border-radius-topright: 5px; -webkit-border-top-right-radius: 5px; -khtml-border-top-right-radius: 5px; -icab-border-top-right-radius: 5px; -o-border-top-right-radius: 5px; background: #ACD36C; line-height: 8pt;" width="80px"> <small>Generation I</small>
</th>
<td>
</td></tr>
<tr>
<td class="roundytr roundybottom" colspan="2" style="background:#ACD36C; padding:2px;">
<table class="roundy" style="background:#FFF; padding:3px;" width="100%">
<tr>
<th class="roundy" style="width: 80px; max-width: 80px; background:#FF1111; border: 2px solid #FF1111; line-height:12pt;"> <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Pok%C3%A9mon_Red_and_Blue" title="Pokémon Red and Blue"><span style="color:#000;">Red</span></a>
</th>
<td class="roundy" rowspan="2" style="vertical-align: middle; border: 1px solid #9DC1B7; padding-left:3px;"> Obviously prefers hot places. When it rains, steam is said to spout from the tip of its tail.
</td></tr>
<tr>
<th class="roundy" style="width: 80px; max-width: 80px; background:#1111FF; border: 2px solid #1111FF; line-height:12pt;"> <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Pok%C3%A9mon_Red_and_Blue" title="Pokémon Red and Blue"><span style="color:#FFF">Blue</span></a>
</th></tr>
<tr>
<th class="roundy" style="width: 80px; max-width: 80px; background:#FFD733; border: 2px solid #FFD733; line-height:12pt;"> <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Pok%C3%A9mon_Yellow" title="Pokémon Yellow"><span style="color:#000;">Yellow </span></a>
</th>
<td class="roundy" style="vertical-align: middle; border: 1px solid #9DC1B7; padding-left:3px;"> The flame at the tip of its tail makes a sound as it burns. You can only hear it in quiet places.
</td></tr>
<tr>
<th class="roundy" style="width: 80px; max-width: 80px; background:#000; border: 2px solid #000; line-height:12pt;"> <a class="mw-disambig" href="/wiki/Pok%C3%A9mon_Stadium" title="Pokémon Stadium"><span style="color:#FFF;">Stadium </span></a>
</th>
<td class="roundy" style="vertical-align: middle; border: 1px solid #9DC1B7; padding-left:3px;"> Even the newborns have flaming tails. Unfamiliar with fire, babies are said to accidentally burn themselves.
</td></tr></table>

</th>
<td>
</td></tr>
<tr>
<td class="roundytr roundybottom" colspan="2" style="background:#DCD677; padding:2px;">
<table class="roundy" style="background:#FFF; padding:3px;" width="100%">
<tr>
<th class="roundy" style="width: 80px; max-width: 80px; background:#DAA520; border: 2px solid #DAA520; line-height:12pt;"> <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Pok%C3%A9mon_Gold" title="Pokémon Gold"><span style="color:#000;">Gold </span></a>
</th>
<td class="roundy" style="vertical-align: middle; border: 1px solid #9DC1B7; padding-left:3px;"> The flame on its tail shows the strength of its life force. If it is weak, the flame also burns weakly.
</td></tr>
<tr>
<th class="roundy" style="width: 80px; max-width: 80px; background:#C0C0C0; border: 2px solid #C0C0C0; line-height:12pt;"> <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Pok%C3%A9mon_Silver" title="Pokémon Silver"><span style="color:#000;">Silver </span></a>
</th>
<td class="roundy" style="vertical-align: middle; border: 1px solid #9DC1B7; padding-left:3px;"> The flame on its tail indicates Charmander's life force. If it is healthy, the flame burns brightly.
</td></tr>
<tr>
<th class="roundy" style="width: 80px; max-width: 80px; background:#4FD9FF; border: 2px solid #4FD9FF; line-height:12pt;"> <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Pok%C3%A9mon_Crystal" title="Pokémon Crystal"><span style="color:#000;">Crystal </span></a>
</th>
<td class="roundy" style="vertical-align: middle; border: 1px solid #9DC1B7; padding-left:3px;"> If it's healthy, the flame on the tip of its tail will burn vigorously, even if it gets a bit wet.
</td></tr>
<tr>
<th class="roundy" style="width: 80px; max-width: 80px; background:#000; border: 2px solid #000; line-height:12pt;"> <a href="/wiki/Pok%C3%A9mon_Stadium_2" title="Pokémon Stadium 2"><span style="color:#FFF;">Stadium 2 </span></a>
</th>
<td class="roundy" style="vertical-align: middle; border: 1px solid #9DC1B7; padding-left:3px;"> The flame on its tail shows the strength of its life force. If it is weak, the flame also burns weakly.
</td></tr></table>
</td></tr></table>
</td></tr>

<table class="roundy" style="background: transparent; border-collapse:collapse;" width="100%">
<tr>
<th style="border-top-left-radius: 5px; -moz-border-radius-topleft: 5px; -webkit-border-top-left-radius: 5px; -khtml-border-top-left-radius: 5px; -icab-border-top-left-radius: 5px; -o-border-top-left-radius: 5px; border-top-right-radius: 5px; -moz-border-radius-topright: 5px; -webkit-border-top-right-radius: 5px; -khtml-border-top-right-radius: 5px; -icab-border-top-right-radius: 5px; -o-border-top-right-radius: 5px; background: #9CD7C8; line-height: 8pt;" width="80px"> <small>Generation III</small>
</th>
<td>
</td></tr>
<tr>
<td class="roundytr roundybottom" colspan="2" style="background:#9CD7C8; padding:2px;">
<table class="roundy" style="background:#FFF; padding:3px;" width="100%">
<tr>
<th class="roundy" style="width: 80px; max-width: 80px; background:#A00000; border: 2px solid #A00000; line-height:12pt;"> <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Pok%C3%A9mon_Ruby_and_Sapphire" title="Pokémon Ruby and Sapphire"><span style="color:#FFF;">Ruby</span></a>
</th>
<td class="roundy" rowspan="2" style="vertical-align: middle; border: 1px solid #9DC1B7; padding-left:3px;"> The flame that burns at the tip of its tail is an indication of its emotions. The flame wavers when Charmander is enjoying itself. If the Pokémon becomes enraged, the flame burns fiercely.
</td></tr>
<tr>
<th class="roundy" style="width: 80px; max-width: 80px; background:#0000A0; border: 2px solid #0000A0; line-height:12pt;"> <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Pok%C3%A9mon_Ruby_and_Sapphire" title="Pokémon Ruby and Sapphire"><span style="color:#FFF">Sapphire</span></a>
</th></tr>
<tr>
<th class="roundy" style="width: 80px; max-width: 80px; background:#00A000; border: 2px solid #00A000; line-height:12pt;"> <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Pok%C3%A9mon_Emerald" title="Pokémon Emerald"><span style="color:#FFF;">Emerald </span></a>
</th>
<td class="roundy" style="vertical-align: middle; border: 1px solid #9DC1B7; padding-left:3px;"> The flame that burns at the tip of its tail is an indication of its emotions. The flame wavers when Charmander is happy, and blazes when it is enraged.
</td></tr>
<tr>
<th class="roundy" style="width: 80px; max-width: 80px; background:#FF7327; border: 2px solid #FF7327; line-height:12pt;"> <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Pok%C3%A9mon_FireRed" title="Pokémon FireRed"><span style="color:#000;">FireRed </span></a>
</th>
<td class="roundy" style="vertical-align: middle; border: 1px solid #9DC1B7; padding-left:3px;"> From the time it is born, a flame burns at the tip of its tail. Its life would end if the flame were to go out.
</td></tr>
<tr>
<th class="roundy" style="width: 80px; max-width: 80px; background:#00DD00; border: 2px solid #00DD00; line-height:12pt;"> <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Pok%C3%A9mon_LeafGreen" title="Pokémon LeafGreen"><span style="color:#000;">LeafGreen </span></a>
</th>
<td class="roundy" style="vertical-align: middle; border: 1px solid #9DC1B7; padding-left:3px;"> It has a preference for hot things. When it rains, steam is said to spout from the tip of its tail.
</td></tr></table>
</td></tr></table>
</td></tr>
<tr>
<td>
<table class="roundy" style="background: transparent; border-collapse:collapse;" width="100%">

</th>
<td>
</td></tr>
<tr>
<td class="roundytr roundybottom" colspan="2" style="background:#B7A3C3; padding:2px;">
<table class="roundy" style="background:#FFF; padding:3px;" width="100%">
<tr>
<th class="roundy" style="width: 80px; max-width: 80px; background:#AAAAFF; border: 2px solid #AAAAFF; line-height:12pt;"> <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Pok%C3%A9mon_Diamond_and_Pearl" title="Pokémon Diamond and Pearl"><span style="color:#000;">Diamond</span></a>
</th>
<td class="roundy" rowspan="3" style="vertical-align: middle; border: 1px solid #9DC1B7; padding-left:3px;"> The fire on the tip of its tail is a measure of its life. If healthy, its tail burns intensely.
</td></tr>
<tr>
<th class="roundy" style="width: 80px; max-width: 80px; background:#FFAAAA; border: 2px solid #FFAAAA; line-height:12pt;"> <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Pok%C3%A9mon_Diamond_and_Pearl" title="Pokémon Diamond and Pearl"><span style="color:#000">Pearl</span></a>
</th></tr>

</th></tr>
<tr>
<th class="roundy" style="width: 80px; max-width: 80px; background:#B69E00; border: 2px solid #B69E00; line-height:12pt;"> <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Pok%C3%A9mon_HeartGold" title="Pokémon HeartGold"><span style="color:#000;">HeartGold </span></a>
</th>
<td class="roundy" style="vertical-align: middle; border: 1px solid #9DC1B7; padding-left:3px;"> The flame on its tail shows the strength of its life force. If it is weak, the flame also burns weakly.
</td></tr>
<tr>
<th class="roundy" style="width: 80px; max-width: 80px; background:#C0C0E1; border: 2px solid #C0C0E1; line-height:12pt;"> <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Pok%C3%A9mon_SoulSilver" title="Pokémon SoulSilver"><span style="color:#000;">SoulSilver </span></a>
</th>
<td class="roundy" style="vertical-align: middle; border: 1px solid #9DC1B7; padding-left:3px;"> The flame on its tail indicates Charmander's life force. If it is healthy, the flame burns brightly.

<th class="roundy" style="width: 80px; max-width: 80px; background:#EA1A3E; border: 2px solid #EA1A3E; line-height:12pt;"> <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Pok%C3%A9mon_Y" title="Pokémon Y"><span style="color:#000;">Y </span></a>
</th>
<td class="roundy" style="vertical-align: middle; border: 1px solid #9DC1B7; padding-left:3px;"> From the time it is born, a flame burns at the tip of its tail. Its life would end if the flame were to go out.
</td></tr>
<tr>
<th class="roundy" style="width: 80px; max-width: 80px; background:#AB2813; border: 2px solid #AB2813; line-height:12pt;"> <a href="/wiki/Pok%C3%A9mon_Omega_Ruby_and_Alpha_Sapphire" title="Pokémon Omega Ruby and Alpha Sapphire"><span style="color:#FFF;">Omega Ruby</span></a>
</th>

</th>

<ul><li><small>Minimum stats are calculated with 0 <a href="/wiki/Effort_values" title="Effort values"><span style="color:#000;">EVs</span></a>, <a href="/wiki/Individual_values" title="Individual values"><span style="color:#000;">IVs</span></a> of 0, and a hindering <a href="/wiki/Nature" title="Nature"><span style="color:#000;">nature</span></a>, if applicable.</small></li>
<li>Maximum stats are calculated with 252 EVs, IVs of 31, and a helpful nature, if applicable.</li>
<li>This Pokémon's <span style="background:#8EC7BC;"> Special </span> base stat in <a href="/wiki/Generation_I" title="Generation I">Generation I</a> was <b>50</b>.</li></ul></td></tr></table>, <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="background: #FF0000; border: 1px solid #A60000;">

<td style="line-height:90%; font-size: 90%; border-bottom: 1px solid #F08030; padding-left: 4px; padding-top:4px;"> <b>Notes:</b>
</td></tr>
<tr>
<td style="line-height:90%; font-size: 90%;">
<ul><li>In <a href="/wiki/Generation_I" title="Generation I"><span style="color:#000;">Generation I</span></a>, the effectiveness of <span style="background: #98D8D8"><a href="/wiki/Ice_(type)" title="Ice (type)"><span style="color:#FFFFFF;"> Ice-type </span></a></span> moves is 1×.</li></ul>
</td></tr></table>
</td></tr></table>, <table align="center" class="roundy" style="background: #F08030;" width="100%">
<tr>
<td align="center" style="line-height:90%; font-size: 90%;" width="50%"> <b>Under normal battle conditions in Generation VII, this Pokémon is:</b>
</td>
<td>
</td></tr></table>, <table align="center" class="roundy" style="background: #F5AC78;" width="100%">
<tr valign="center">
<th width="100px"> Damaged<br/>normally by:

<ul><li><b>Bold</b> indicates a move that gets <a href="/wiki/Same-type_attack_bonus" title="Same-type attack bonus"><span style="color:#000;">STAB</span></a> when used by Charmander</li>

<th style="line-height:10px;"> <small>Other generations:</small>
</th></tr>

<td style="background:#FFF; border:1px solid #D8D8D8;"> 20

<tr>
<td class="roundybottom" style="background:#F5AC78; font-size: 90%; line-height:10px;">
<ul><li>Moves marked with an asterisk (*) must be <a href="/wiki/Chain_breeding" title="Chain breeding"><span style="color:#000;">chain bred</span></a> onto Charmander in Generation VII</li>
<li>Moves marked with a double dagger (‡) can only be bred from a Pokémon who learned the move in an earlier generation.</li>
<li>Moves marked with a superscript game abbreviation can only be bred onto Charmander in that game.</li>
<li><b>Bold</b> indicates a move that gets <a href="/wiki/Same-type_attack_bonus" title="Same-type attack bonus"><span style="color:#000;">STAB</span></a> when used by Charmander</li>
<li><i>Italic</i> indicates a move that gets STAB only when used by an evolution  of Charmander</li>
<li>Click on the generation numbers at the top to see Egg moves from other generations</li></ul>
</td></tr></table>, <table style="background:transparent;" width="100%">
<tr>
<th style="line-height:30px;" width="60%"> <big><big><big>Generation VII</big></big></big>
</th>
<th width="40%">
<table class="roundy" style="margin:auto; background:transparent; border: 2px solid #F08030;">
<tr>
<th style="line-height:10px;"> <small>Other generations:</small>
</th></tr>
<tr>

<tr>
<th style="line-height:30px;" width="60%"> <big><big><big>Generation VII</big></big></big>

<th style="line-height:10px;"> <small>Other generations:</small>
</th></tr>

<td class="roundybottom" style="background:#F5AC78; font-size: 90%; line-height:10px;">
<ul><li>A black or white abbreviation in a colored box indicates that Charmander can be tutored the move in that game</li>
<li>A colored abbreviation in a white box indicates that Charmander cannot be tutored the move in that game</li>
<li><b>Bold</b> indicates a move that gets <a href="/wiki/Same-type_attack_bonus" title="Same-type attack bonus"><span style="color:#000;">STAB</span></a> when used by Charmander</li>
<li><i>Italic</i> indicates a move that gets STAB only when used by an evolution  of Charmander</li>
<li>Click on the generation numbers at the top to see Move Tutor moves from other generations</li></ul>

<td><a class="image" href="/wiki/File:Germany_Flag.png"><img alt="Germany Flag.png" height="12" src="//cdn.bulbagarden.net/upload/thumb/5/52/Germany_Flag.png/20px-Germany_Flag.png" srcset="//cdn.bulbagarden.net/upload/thumb/5/52/Germany_Flag.png/30px-Germany_Flag.png 1.5x, //cdn.bulbagarden.net/upload/thumb/5/52/Germany_Flag.png/40px-Germany_Flag.png 2x" width="20"/></a> <a href="/wiki/Pok%C3%A9mon_in_Germany" title="Pokémon in Germany">German</a>
</td>
<td>Glumanda
</td>
<td>From <i><span class="explain" title="ember, also the German translation for the move Ember">Glut</span></i> and <i><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Salamander" title="wp:Salamander">Salamander</a></i>
</td></tr>
<tr style="background:#FFF">
<td><a class="image" href="/wiki/File:Italy_Flag.png"><img alt="Italy Flag.png" height="13" src="//cdn.bulbagarden.net/upload/thumb/7/7a/Italy_Flag.png/20px-Italy_Flag.png" srcset="//cdn.bulbagarden.net/upload/thumb/7/7a/Italy_Flag.png/30px-Italy_Flag.png 1.5x, //cdn.bulbagarden.net/upload/thumb/7/7a/Italy_Flag.png/40px-Italy_Flag.png 2x" width="20"/></a> <a href="/wiki/Pok%C3%A9mon_in_Italy" title="Pokémon in Italy">Italian</a>
</td>
<td>Charmander
</td>
<td>Same as English name
</td></tr>
<tr style="background:#FFF">
<td><a class="image" href="/wiki/File:South_Korea_Flag.png"><img alt="South Korea Flag.png" height="13" src="//cdn.bulbagarden.net/upload/thumb/e/e7/South_Korea_Flag.png/20px-South_Korea_Flag.png" srcset="//cdn.bulbagarden.net/upload/thumb/e/e7/South_Korea_Flag.png/30px-South_Korea_Flag.png 1.5x, //cdn.bulbagarden.net/upload/thumb/e/e7/South_Korea_Flag.png/40px-South_Korea_Flag.png 2x" width="20"/></a> <a href="/wiki/Pok%C3%A9mon_in_South_Korea" title="Pokémon in South Korea">Korean</a>
</td>
<td>파이리 <i>Fairit</i>
</td>
<td>From <span class="explain" title="fire">파이어 <i>paieo</i></span> and <span class="explain" title="tail">꼬리 <i>kkori</i></span>
</td></tr>
<tr style="background:#FFF">
<td><a class="image" href="/wiki/File:Hong_Kong_Flag.png"><img alt="Hong Kong Flag.png" height="13" src="//cdn.bulbagarden.net/upload/thumb/8/89/Hong_Kong_Flag.png/20px-Hong_Kong_Flag.png" srcset="//cdn.bulbagarden.net/upload/thumb/8/89/Hong_Kong_Flag.png/30px-Hong_Kong_Flag.png 1.5x, //cdn.bulbagarden.net/upload/thumb/8/89/Hong_Kong_Flag.png/40px-Hong_Kong_Flag.png 2x" width="20"/></a> <a href="/wiki/Pok%C3%A9mon_in_Greater_China" title="Pokémon in Greater China"><span class="explain" title="Hong Kong">Cantonese Chinese</span></a>
</td>
<td>小火龍 <i>Síufólùhng</i>
</td>
<td>Literally "Little fiery dragon". May also be from <a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pitaya" title="wp:Pitaya"><span class="explain" title="pitaya">火龍果 <i>fólùhnggwó</i></span></a>
</td></tr>
<tr style="background:#FFF">
<td><a class="image" href="/wiki/File:China_and_Taiwan_Flags.png"><img alt="China and Taiwan Flags.png" height="13" src="//cdn.bulbagarden.net/upload/thumb/c/c1/China_and_Taiwan_Flags.png/20px-China_and_Taiwan_Flags.png" srcset="//cdn.bulbagarden.net/upload/thumb/c/c1/China_and_Taiwan_Flags.png/30px-China_and_Taiwan_Flags.png 1.5x, //cdn.bulbagarden.net/upload/thumb/c/c1/China_and_Taiwan_Flags.png/40px-China_and_Taiwan_Flags.png 2x" width="20"/></a> <a href="/wiki/Pok%C3%A9mon_in_Greater_China" title="Pokémon in Greater China"><span class="explain" title="Taiwan and mainland China">Mandarin Chinese</span></a>
</td>
<td>小火龍 / 小火龙 <i>Xiǎohǔolóng</i>
</td>
<td>Literally "Little fiery dragon". May also be from <span class="explain" title="a colloquial term for lizard">小龍 <i>xiǎolóng</i></span>
</td></tr>
